name: Game Boy Advance Video: DreamWorks Shrek
overview: GBA Video: Shrek brings the hit movie to your portable game system -- now you can watch it anywhere you go! Shrek is an ogre in a fairy tale forest, who doesn't want to be bothered. When a princess crosses his path, he becomes an unlikely - and unwilling hero. Comedy and fairy t ale magic combine for a story that kids will enjoy. Playable on the Game Boy Advance and compatible systems.
